titles: On Saynt Andrewes day the Gospels with brief sermo[n]s vpon them for al the holy dayes in y[e] yere.
author: Taverner, Richard, 1505?-1575.
publisher: Imprinted in Fletestret next to the White Harte by Rycharde Bankes,
